description: If you set up a London Road User Charging account you can also register to pay for LEZ automatically

texts: Before we can process your LEZ registration, you need to set up a London Road User Charging account.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Setting up a London Road User Charging account"}

To create an account, click on 'Continue' and complete all required fields. You can also set up optional services, such as mobile phone text alerts, to help you manage your account. (Sign in now if you already have an account.)
Having an account with us means you can:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["View your vehicle details","Allow up to\u003cstrong\u003e5 \u003c/strong\u003e people access to your London Road User Charging account"]}
Once your London Road User Charging account has been created and you sign in, you will be automatically directed to register your vehicle(s).
Most vehicles registered in the United Kingdom don't need to be registered with us.
If you believe we hold incorrect or insufficient information about your vehicle to accurately determine the LEZ charge due, you can register your vehicle with us.
You will only need to register your vehicle with us if:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["We think it does not \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/low-emission-zone/check-if-your-vehicle-is-affected\"\u003emeet the LEZ emissions standards\u003c/a\u003e but you can provide documentary evidence that it does","You are a \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/low-emission-zone/check-if-your-vehicle-is-affected/exemptions-and-discounts\"\u003eshowman with a modified or specially constructed vehicle\u003c/a\u003e ","Your vehicle is being charged the £200 daily LEZ charge and you can provide evidence that it should be charged the £100 daily LEZ Charge"]}
You will need to register your vehicle with us if:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["It meets the LEZ emissions standards","It qualifies for an \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/low-emission-zone/check-if-your-vehicle-is-affected/exemptions-and-discounts\"\u003eexemption or discount\u003c/a\u003e ","Your vehicle is registered in Northern Ireland, has a full filter and has been issued with a Reduced Pollution Certificate (RPC)","Your vehicle is being charged the £200 daily LEZ charge and you can provide evidence that it should be charged the £100 daily LEZ charge"]}
